thread.title: BRIEF-Anevia selected by Blizoo to launch new multiscreen service
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Anevia selected by Blizoo to launch new multiscreen service | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: BRIEF-Anevia selected by Blizoo to launch new multiscreen service
text:
Oct 14 Anevia SA :
* Says to have been selected by Blizoo, a cable company from Bulgaria, for ViaMotion technology to be used for the launch of Live Blizoo, its new OTT multi-screen service Source text: bit.ly/1G5EzGa Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
